issues.message: The post-patch character state invariants for CHAR_ARTIE contradict the authoritative must_stay_true block regarding ITEM_WALLET custody (carried vs dropped).

evidence.excerpt: must_stay_true: 'inventory: world -> Leather Wallet (status=dropped, container=floor)' vs character_states.invariants: 'inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Leather Wallet (status=carried, container=hand_right)'
